评论详情: It came bent so I tried to fix it . 🫤

评论概述: Plating rubs off after two wears
评论详情: The silver plating wore off by the second use and started staining my finger black :( my expectations were low given the price but I thought I'd get more than one wear out of it!! This isn't worth it at all, save your money!!!

This is fun, unique, and I think it looks good with both casual and dressier other jewelry.  For me, it is a ring I look forward to wearing often.  TIP: Always remove BEFORE washing hand, or working on something where ring might catch (cooking to working on art projects, of a car). Twice I almost lost this down the sink! Soap makes ring loose. An open back ring doesn’t stick on a finger the way a better ring, that is closed, does.
